original: Moberg, Ove Joel Arnoid, lektor, Karlisham^n, f. 8/1/14 i Limhamn, Mal-möh. 1., av J. T. M. o. Alma Ake&son. G. 36 m. Inga Strömberg. Barn: Kerstin f. 38, Jöran Ove 42. — Stud :ex. 33, fil. mag. i Lund 35, fil. lic. 38, disp. f. gr. 41, provår i Lund 42. Vik. ämnes-iär. v. Maimö prakt. me’llansk. 35 o. 36, vik. (lektor v. Lunds folksk :s’em. 39-40, timlär. där 40-41, v. Lunds priv. elem:sk. 41, i Ystad 43, e. adj. i Kristianstad 43-44, vik. (kktor i Häsisle-holm 44-45, kommunalt ans t. ilelktor i modersm. o. hist. m. samh :lära v. Karis’hamns komm. gymn. sed. 45. Anist. v. priv. föret, i Maimö 28-32, vik. å drätselkamm. där somr. 34 o. 35. Medarb. i tidn. Arbetet ^sed. 36. Glee-rupsk stip. v. univ. i Köpenhamn 40 0. 41. Led. av stadsfullm. i Karltshamn sed. 46. Skr.: Olav Harailds’Son, Knut den store o. Sv:e (avh.) m. m.
translated: Moberg, Ove Joel Arnoid, lecturer, Karlskrona, b. 8/1/1914 in Limhamn, Malmö. 1st, son of J.T.M. and Alma Åkesson. Married in 1936 to Inga Strömberg. Children: Kerstin b. 1938, Jöran Ove b. 1942. Studied: graduated 1933, Bachelor of Arts in Lund 1935, Master of Arts in Lund 1938, started doctoral studies in 1941, trial year in Lund 1942. Substitute subject teacher in Malmö practical middle school in 1935 and 1936, substitute lecturer at Lund elementary school from 1939-1940, temporary teacher there from 1940-1941, at Lund private elementary school in 1941, in Ystad in 1943, assistant teacher in Kristianstad from 1943-1944, substitute lecturer in Hässleholm from 1944-1945, municipal employee as lecturer in mother tongue and history with social sciences at Karlskrona municipal high school since 1945. Worked at a private company in Malmö from 1928-1932, substitute at the financial chamber in Malmö in the summer of 1934 and 1935. Collaborator at the newspaper Arbetet since 1936. Received a scholarship from the University of Copenhagen in 1940 and 1941. Member of the city council in Karlskrona since 1946. Writings include "Olav Haraldsson," "Canute the Great," and "Swedish History" (thesis), among others.

structured.name: Ove Joel Arnoid Moberg
